message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.AI

The paper deals with 3D human shape estimation from single images, which is a problem in computer vision (cs.CV). The paper also presents a new dataset (3DPeople) with annotated segmentation masks, skeletons, depth, normal maps, and optical flow, which falls under computer graphics (cs.GR) and multimedia (cs.MM). The paper proposes a novel shape parameterization algorithm based on optimal mass transportation, which is a mathematical optimization technique and falls under machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.LG, and cs.AI.
